name: Spriggan

aspects.high_concept: Ancient Guardian Spirit of Skyrim's Forests
other_aspects: Hostile to Those Who Harm the Wilds

stunts: Nature's Ally: Once per scene, summon 2-3 woodland animals (wolves, bears) to aid in combat
Healing Aura: When in natural outdoor environments, regenerate one physical stress at start of turn
Swarm of Insects: Create aspect 'Swarmed by Insects' in target zone (two free invokes, causes distraction)
notes: Spriggans are nature spirits that protect Skyrim's forests. They can summon animals to their aid and regenerate in natural settings. Extremely hostile to those who harm nature. Vulnerable to fire damage.
combat_tactics: Spriggans use nature magic and summon animals to fight for them. They stay mobile, using the terrain to their advantage. In forests, they regenerate quickly. They prioritize fire-wielding enemies.
